name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】Attention Please!! Special Tea Party with Pavolia Reine!!! #PavoliaReine3D [aBgFX_2oIU4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Pavolia Reine performs her original song "Ano Aozora no Sei da" (It's Because of That Blue Sky).
Pavolia Reine introduces herself, showcases her 3D model, and realizes her room is a mess before guests arrive.

subtitles.original: あの青空のせいだ
subtitles.english: It's because of that blue sky

subtitles.original: キミも同じであれと願う
subtitles.english: I hope you're the same

subtitles.original: この恋はどこまで
subtitles.english: How far will this love go?

subtitles.english: These feelings I don't want to end

subtitles.english: Until the day I can find it

subtitles.english: Staying like this for a bit longer

subtitles.english: Dazzling shine mirage, pulling our lines

subtitles.original: 寄せたなら would you be mine?
subtitles.english: If I draw closer, would you be mine?

subtitles.english: A story I'm imagining

subtitles.english: I want to become more than we are now

subtitles.original: 溢れそう 泣きそう どうして
subtitles.english: Overwhelming, about to cry, why?

subtitles.original: すぐに会いたくなるよ
subtitles.english: I immediately want to see you

subtitles.english: The beautiful starlight

subtitles.original: それより明日がいい
subtitles.english: Tomorrow is better than that

subtitles.original: WHOA! Whose 3D showcase is this?
subtitles.english: WHOA! Whose 3D showcase is this?

subtitles.original: Whose 3D showcase is this?!
subtitles.english: Whose 3D showcase is this?!

subtitles.original: You guys are right!
subtitles.english: You guys are right!

subtitles.original: Attention, please! I'm Pavolia Reine from hololive ID Generation 2!
subtitles.english: Attention, please! I'm Pavolia Reine from hololive ID Generation 2!

subtitles.original: Berhatian! Sang putri merak yang tertiup angin, aku Pavolia Reine dari hololive ID generasi 2!
subtitles.english: Attention! The peacock princess blown by the wind, I am Pavolia Reine from hololive ID Generation 2!

subtitles.original: Attention please! ホロライブID二期生 パヴォリア・レイネです！
subtitles.english: Attention please! This is Pavolia Reine from hololive ID 2nd Gen!

subtitles.original: Welcome to Reine's very, very special tea party!
subtitles.english: Welcome to Reine's very, very special tea party!

subtitles.original: Oh, before we start, please do tweet with this hashtag...
subtitles.english: Oh, before we start, please do tweet with this hashtag...

subtitles.original: ...this hashtag, #PavoliaReine3D!
subtitles.english: ...this hashtag, #PavoliaReine3D!

subtitles.original: My child, please tweet!
subtitles.english: My child, please tweet!

subtitles.original: Because I would like to hear your kansou and opinion about the live!
subtitles.english: Because I would like to hear your impressions and opinions about the live!

subtitles.original: So what are you waiting for? Tweet right now!
subtitles.english: So what are you waiting for? Tweet right now!

subtitles.original: Or later, if you want.
subtitles.english: Or later, if you want.

subtitles.original: ツイートしてください！ぜひぜひね！
subtitles.english: Please tweet! Definitely, okay?

subtitles.original: Tweet!
subtitles.english: Tweet!

subtitles.original: Awas kalau nggak.
subtitles.english: Watch out if you don't.

subtitles.original: So, そうですね。 I started off with two songs.
subtitles.english: So, that's right. I started off with two songs.

subtitles.original: 2曲連続歌いましたね。 最初は「Gate Open: START!」と...
subtitles.english: I sang two songs in a row. First was "Gate Open: START!" and...

subtitles.original: ...「あの青空のせいだ」! Both are Reine's original songs!
subtitles.english: ..."Ano Aozora no Sei da"! Both are Reine's original songs!

subtitles.original: YAY!
subtitles.english: YAY!

subtitles.original: Ah, but oh no!
subtitles.english: Ah, but oh no!

subtitles.original: What am I gonna do? I gotta clean!
subtitles.english: What am I gonna do? I gotta clean!

subtitles.original: But before that, let me show you guys...
subtitles.english: But before that, let me show you guys...

subtitles.original: ...show you guys the model!
subtitles.english: ...show you guys the model!

subtitles.original: How do you think I look?
subtitles.english: How do you think I look?

subtitles.original: WHOA! No, you don't see anything!
subtitles.english: WHOA! No, you don't see anything!

subtitles.original: Shh! Camera, camera, camera!
subtitles.english: Shh! Camera, camera, camera!

subtitles.original: Okay, YAY!
subtitles.english: Okay, YAY!

subtitles.original: WHOA! You don't see—
subtitles.english: WHOA! You don't see—

subtitles.original: Yeah! Nice, right?
subtitles.english: Yeah! Nice, right?

subtitles.original: Oh, Reine's back! Oh my god, for real!
subtitles.english: Oh, Reine's back! Oh my god, for real!

subtitles.original: Reine... Mmm! Yeah! You don't see anything...
subtitles.english: Reine... Mmm! Yeah! You don't see anything...

subtitles.original: ...except me in my very clean room!
subtitles.english: ...except me in my very clean room!

subtitles.original: YAY! Clean room!
subtitles.english: YAY! Clean room!

subtitles.original: Okay, but for real though...
subtitles.english: Okay, but for real though...

subtitles.original: ...what am I gonna do?
subtitles.english: ...what am I gonna do?

subtitles.original: The 3D showcase, the private tea party is today!
subtitles.english: The 3D showcase, the private tea party is today!

subtitles.original: But my room is still a mess!
subtitles.english: But my room is still a mess!

subtitles.original: Oh no! どうしようね。
subtitles.english: Oh no! What should I do?

subtitles.original: 今日お披露目だったのに 部屋はめちゃめちゃダーティーですね！
subtitles.english: It's my showcase today, but my room is super dirty!

subtitles.original: NO! I've got some guests coming too!
subtitles.english: NO! I've got some guests coming too!

subtitles.original: What do I do? What do I do?
subtitles.english: What do I do? What do I do?

subtitles.original: I guess I gotta get cleaning, huh?
subtitles.english: I guess I gotta get cleaning, huh?

subtitles.original: Hah...
subtitles.english: Hah...
